ValidationRule.description: If opportunity stage is closed lost, reason for lost field is required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
$Setup.byPass__c.ByPass_Validation__c = FALSE,
OR( RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_DIRECT, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PMP, RecordType.DeveloperName = $Label.OPP_RECORDTYPEDEVNAME_PROGRAMMATIC ),
ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost'), ISBLANK(TEXT(Reason_for_Lost__c ))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: if stage = closed lost, please fill out the reason for lost
